scripts.build-docs-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules docs/sass --source-map true --output-style compressed --output docs/css
scripts.build-docs-site: bundle exec jekyll build --source docs --destination docs/_site
scripts.build-docs: yarn run build && yarn run build-docs-css && yarn run build-docs-site
scripts.serve: yarn run build-docs && bundle exec jekyll serve --source docs --destination docs/_site --port ${PORT} -H 0.0.0.0
scripts.clean: rm -rf build docs/css docs/_site node_modules/ yarn-error.log .bundle

devDependenciesComments.vanilla-framework: vanilla-framework is included in devDependencies for use in styling the docs site
